Sinceramente,
Diane Nelson

Dear CS Lewis Family, in light of Governor Herbert’s announcement today that all students, teachers, staff, parents and Volunteers￼ are required to wear masks, I wanted to make sure you were aware that we will be running a full online program, blended learning program and in person program this coming school year. I will be sending out a survey next week for you to let us know which option you would like your students to be in. These programs will be fluid so you can move from one to the other if your preference changes. As we are still working on our reopen plan, we don’t have all the details but I wanted to ease your worries as much as possible during this time. Please email me with any questions or concerns you have. Thank you for being so supportive of our amazing staff and school!

Sincerely,
Diane Nelson
Dnelson@cslewisacademy.net

b. On Twitter @lewis_academy
